title: Get two 4K camera drones for under $110 for a limited time
content:
Macworld

Viewing the world from grand heights is incredible, and having a drone makes it easier. If you’ve ever been interested in getting a drone, now is a great time to do it. That’s because from September 23 through 30, we’re offering the Alpha Z PRO 4K and Flying Fox 4K Wide-Angle drones bundled for only $109.97 (reg. $398).

These two drones are each equipped with a 4K front camera and a 720p bottom camera to capture nearly panoramic views while soaring through the skies. They both have an APK system to take pictures and video, providing real-time first-person transmission through the companion app. With a six-axis gyroscope, four-channel modes, and altitude hold mode, they’re also easy for novice pilots to fly. They’ll even come back and land safely with the click of a single button.

With the Alpha Z PRO, you’ll get a sleek black quadcopter. Its wide-angle capabilities allow you to adjust it 90 degrees, while its 360-degree roll feature can give you stunning, panoramic views you can deliver straight to your device, whether that’s an iPhone or iPad. The Alpha Z PRO will fly for 7 to 9 minutes with a full battery.

Meanwhile, the Flying Fox drone comes in a silver finish with gesture control, which lets you use gestures with your hands to take a photo or record a video. Plus, its follow function makes it easy to connect the distance between the drone and the location of its controller to link them. This drone will fly for 9 to 12 minutes on a full charge.

Take to the skies on a budget and experience your world from new heights.

From September 23 through September 30 at 11:59 pm Pacific, you can get this bundle featuring the Alpha Z PRO 4K and Flying Fox 4K Wide-Angle Dual-Camera Drones for just $109.97.
